globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.youtube.com https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*; img-src 'self' data: https://i.ytimg.com https://*.googleusercontent.com https://coded.blob.core.windows.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://www.google.com;
